author: Anton Martaplias
description: Squeeze the lemon peels into chilled glass. Add other ingredients. Fill with ice and stir.Special ingredient No.1 Syrup Milk Oolong Add 50ml of concentrate oolong tea to 100g sugar syrup (1 parts of sugar to 1 part of water), boil and leave to cool, then filter .
